price: Dũkiyõyinku da ɗiyanku fitina* ɗai ne. Kuma Allah, a wurin Sa akwai wani sakamako mai girma.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ
footnotes: * Fitina, ita ce duk abin da zai cũci mutum ta hanyar da yake amincewa, cũtar ta dũniya ce kõ ta Lãhira. Cũtar Lãhira ta fi tsanani sabõda girman hasãrar da ke a cikinta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innamā amwālukum wa-awlādukum fit'natun wal-lahu ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
